test_results.name: Graph renders with microservice bubble centered
test_results.details: OrderService microservice bubble visible and centered in SVG

test_results.name: All 3 gateways (REST, KAFKA, SOAP) visible around microservice
test_results.details: REST (API Gateway), KAFKA (Event Bus), SOAP (Legacy Bridge) all visible

test_results.name: Outbound endpoints displayed as teal rounded rectangles
test_results.details: PaymentService, InventoryAPI, ShippingService etc. rendered correctly

test_results.name: Inbound endpoints displayed as indigo rounded rectangles
test_results.details: POST /orders, GET /orders/{id}, payment.completed etc. rendered correctly

test_results.name: Bezier curves connect microservice to gateways and gateways to endpoints
test_results.details: SVG paths with Q (quadratic bezier) found connecting elements

test_results.name: Hover tooltips show element details
test_results.details: Tooltips display on hover showing element name, type, and related info

test_results.name: Click on element brings it forward (z-index change)
test_results.details: Selected elements get visual highlighting (stroke-width, drop-shadow)

test_results.name: Legend displays all element types with correct colors
test_results.details: Legend shows Microservice, REST/Kafka/SOAP Gateway, Outbound (calls), Inbound (exposes)

notes: All features working as expected. Visualization renders correctly with Material Design colors.
